## TryCpScenario.shareAllAgents() method

Register all agents of all passed in conductors to each other. This skips peer discovery through gossip and thus accelerates test runs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shareAllAgents(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
